title: Arabian World Movies
description: A dynamic movie portal to explore, rate, and review movies.
features: Interactive movie portal with detailed information including ratings, genres, and release years
User authentication using Firebase
Featured movies section with carousel effects and notifications using SweetAlert2
Responsive design using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI
Smooth animations with AOS and Animate.css
Star rating system using React Rating Star
Search functionality to search by title and filter by rating and release year
authenticationAndDatabase: Firebase for user authentication and hosting
challenges: Designing and implementing the search and filtering functionality required advanced knowledge of React state management.
improvements: Add more features like user profiles and personalized recommendations to improve user engagement.
lackings: Backend scalability is limited for a large database of movies due to minimal indexing.
learningOutcomes: Learned to integrate front-end components with MongoDB and Firebase, improved skills in creating responsive carousels, and built a better understanding of animations with AOS.
